import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from "axios" import FormData from "form-data" export default class Timeline extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ description:"", image:"" } } handleChange=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } submit=(e)=>{ const id=localStorage.getItem("id") e.preventDefault(); let form = new FormData(); console.log(this.state.image) form.append("image",this.state.image) form.append("description",this.state.description) form.append("_id",id) axios.post("http://localhost:3002/upload/post",form,{headers:{ "Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"} }).then((response)=>{ console.log(response) }) } handleFileChange=(e)=>{ this.setState({ image:e.target.files[0] }) } render() { { console.log(this.state.image)} return (
